game.name: Noslrac
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Find the cure for the King of Banglesway and defeat hordes of enemies led by Noslrac in this thrilling and suspenseful action RPG. Find and craft items of epic proportions to wreak havoc on whoever dares to oppose you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Find the cure for the King of Banglesway and defeat hordes of enemies led by Noslrac in this thrilling and suspenseful action RPG. Find and craft items of epic proportions to wreak havoc on whoever dares to oppose you.
